name: Riders Never Die (Prototype Demo)
description:
PRESS ESCAPE TO EXIT FULLSCREEN!

Riders Never Die is a prototype sandbox biking game currently in a demo phase. So far my plan is to make levels that you can ride around in, however instead of racing like most biking games, you will perform BMX tricks and attempt to earn a specified amount of points within a short time! However, this is only an idea/draft of the game. If you would like to try it please play it on a PC browser or with a keyboard and mouse as it does not support touch controls (You don't need a mouse, tapping the screen to start will work as well). Starting the game will show the controls. Consider donating if you would like for it to be a full game! I will try to respond to any forums/threads/replies as quick as possible!
